title: Wildflower
description: True Love Blooms in the Wildest Hearts...Dani:The spirited beauty with a heart of unsinkable courage ventured alone through the untamed Rocky Mountain wilderness of 1830. Dressed as a man, she duped unwanted attackers and survived the perils of the West—but her heart held passionate dreams and unspoken desires.Troy:A darkly handsome explorer, he kidnapped Dani on a lark—and was himself captivated by the beauty of her unwavering spirit, and the untapped passion within her innocent heart. But a shadowy secret had left Troy's heart as barren as the rocky terrain he traveled.WildflowerFrom the great peaks of the West to the lush seclusion of a Caribbean jungle, Dani and Troy discovered the deepest treasures of the heart.
author: Jill Marie Landis
